I

IController - Interface in client
Specialized client-side controller that is asked to respond to a specific response Message received from the server in response to one of our client's request Message A response is detected by comparing the IDs of a request sent by the client with the ID of a response received from the server.
id() - Method in interface server.ClientState
Retrieve our unique id.
id() - Method in class server.ServerThread
Return (statistically) unique id.
id() - Method in class xml.Message
Determine the id for the message.
id - Static variable in class xml.Parser
Common id across request/responses.
ids() - Static method in class server.Server
Return the unique IDs for all connected clients.
IMessageHandler - Interface in client
 
IProtocolHandler - Interface in server
ServerThread out-sources processing of protocol to implementors of this interface.
IShutdownHandler - Interface in server
If you want to be told when a client exits, make sure your ProtocolHandler implements IShutdownHandler instead of IProtocolHandler.
isLocked() - Method in class server.model.Game
